languages.text: Отсек за дверью оказался почти полностью заполнен биомассой. Неизвестные животные и растения плавали в потоках слизистой субстанции, на поверку оказавшейся видом плесени. Там же обнаружились исчезнувшие ранее члены экипажа, перепуганные и ничего не помнящие. Они пришли в себя уже в отсеке, в который прямо из зеркала стекала биомасса. От утопления их отделяли каких-то полчаса.

traits.locale_text: Отсек за дверью оказался почти полностью заполнен биомассой. Неизвестные животные и растения плавали в потоках слизистой субстанции, на поверку оказавшейся видом плесени. Там же обнаружились исчезнувшие ранее члены экипажа, перепуганные и ничего не помнящие. Они пришли в себя уже в отсеке, в который прямо из зеркала стекала биомасса. От утопления их отделяли каких-то полчаса.

languages.text: The compartment was brimming with biomatter — strange creatures and plants floating in streams of a slimy substance, revealed to be a type of mould upon closer inspection. The missing crew members were also found inside, terrified and unable to remember anything. They returned to awareness while still inside the compartment. They had been only half an hour away from drowning in the biomatter still oozing from the mirror.
languages.original_text: Отсек за дверью оказался почти полностью заполнен биомассой. Неизвестные животные и растения плавали в потоках слизистой субстанции, на поверку оказавшейся видом плесени. Там же обнаружились исчезнувшие ранее члены экипажа, перепуганные и ничего не помнящие. Они пришли в себя уже в отсеке, в который прямо из зеркала стекала биомасса. От утопления их отделяли каких-то полчаса.

traits.locale_text: The compartment turns out to bee almost full with hideous biomass. Unnameable creatures and plants float in a slimy substance which turns out to be a type of fetid mold. The lost crew members were also found in the compartment, albeit scared and suffering from memory loss. They came to upon being returned to the compartment along with the other creatures leaking from the mirror. They were half an hour away from drowning in biomass.

The compartment turns out to bee almost full with hideous biomass. Unnameable creatures and plants float in a slimy substance which turns out to be a type of fetid mold. The lost crew members were also found in the compartment, albeit scared and suffering from memory loss. They came to upon being returned to the compartment along with the other creatures leaking from the mirror. They were half an hour away from drowning in biomass.

The compartment turns out to be almost full of hideous biomass. Untold creatures and plants float in a slimy substance which turns out to be a type of fetid mould. The lost crew members were also found in the compartment, albeit scared and suffering from memory loss. They came to in the compartment while biomass continued to ooze forth from the mirror. They were only a half an hour away from drowning in biomass.

The compartment was brimming with biomatter — strange creatures and plants floating in streams of a slimy substance, revealed to be a type of mould upon closer inspection. The missing crew members were also found inside, terrified and unable to remember anything. They returned to awareness while still inside the compartment. They had been only half an hour away from drowning in the biomatter still oozing from the mirror.

The missing crew members were also found inside, terrified and unable to remember anything. They returned to awareness while still inside the compartment. They had been only half an hour away from drowning in the biomatter still oozing from the mirror.

The compartment was brimming with biomatter — strange creatures and plants floating in streams of a slimy substance, revealed to be a type of mould upon closer inspection. The missing crew members were also found inside, terrified and unable to remember anything. They returned to awareness while still inside the compartment. They had been only half an hour away from drowning in the biomatter still oozing from the mirror.

languages.text: 船舱里充满了生物质，古怪的动植物漂浮在粘稠的液体之中。经过仔细检查，船员确定了这种粘稠的物质是一种霉菌。那些失踪的船员也包裹在液体之中。他们被吓坏了，什么都不记得了。不过，那些船员还没有被抬出船舱，就已经恢复了意识。如果再在船舱里呆上半个小时，恐怕他们就要被镜子渗出的生物质彻底吞没了。
languages.original_text: The compartment was brimming with biomatter — strange creatures and plants floating in streams of a slimy substance, revealed to be a type of mould upon closer inspection. The missing crew members were also found inside, terrified and unable to remember anything. They returned to awareness while still inside the compartment. They had been only half an hour away from drowning in the biomatter still oozing from the mirror.

traits.locale_text: 船舱里充满了生物质，古怪的动植物漂浮在粘稠的液体之中。经过仔细检查，船员确定了这种粘稠的物质是一种霉菌。那些失踪的船员也包裹在液体之中。他们被吓坏了，什么都不记得了。不过，那些船员还没有被抬出船舱，就已经恢复了意识。如果再在船舱里呆上半个小时，恐怕他们就要被镜子渗出的生物质彻底吞没了。

languages.text: El compartimento estaba lleno de materia orgánica: criaturas y plantas desconocidas flotando en riachuelos de una sustancia viscosa que resulta ser un tipo de moho. Los tripulantes desaparecidos también se encontraban en su interior, aterrados e incapaces de recordar nada. Recuperaron el sentido dentro del compartimento. De haber pasado media hora más allí, se habrían ahogado en la materia orgánica que seguía rezumando el espejo.
languages.original_text: The compartment was brimming with biomatter — strange creatures and plants floating in streams of a slimy substance, revealed to be a type of mould upon closer inspection. The missing crew members were also found inside, terrified and unable to remember anything. They returned to awareness while still inside the compartment. They had been only half an hour away from drowning in the biomatter still oozing from the mirror.

traits.locale_text: El compartimento estaba lleno de materia orgánica: criaturas y plantas desconocidas flotando en riachuelos de una sustancia viscosa que resulta ser un tipo de moho. Los tripulantes desaparecidos también se encontraban en su interior, aterrados e incapaces de recordar nada. Recuperaron el sentido dentro del compartimento. De haber pasado media hora más allí, se habrían ahogado en la materia orgánica que seguía rezumando el espejo.

languages.text: その区画室はバイオマターで溢れていた。奇妙な生き物や植物が、ヌメヌメした物質の筋に浮かんでいたのだ。よく見るとカビの一種であることがわかる。行方不明になっていたクルーも区画室内で発見されたが、恐怖で何も思い出せないでいた。彼らは区画室の中で意識を取り戻した。あとわずか30分ほどで、鏡から今もにじみ出るバイオマターに溺れるところだった。
languages.original_text: The compartment was brimming with biomatter — strange creatures and plants floating in streams of a slimy substance, revealed to be a type of mould upon closer inspection. The missing crew members were also found inside, terrified and unable to remember anything. They returned to awareness while still inside the compartment. They had been only half an hour away from drowning in the biomatter still oozing from the mirror.

traits.locale_text: その区画室はバイオマターで溢れていた。奇妙な生き物や植物が、ヌメヌメした物質の筋に浮かんでいたのだ。よく見るとカビの一種であることがわかる。行方不明になっていたクルーも区画室内で発見されたが、恐怖で何も思い出せないでいた。彼らは区画室の中で意識を取り戻した。あとわずか30分ほどで、鏡から今もにじみ出るバイオマターに溺れるところだった。

languages.text: Das Modul quoll über von Biomasse — merkwürdige Kreaturen und Pflanzen, die in Strömen einer schleimigen Substanz schwammen, die sich bei näherer Betrachtung als eine Art Schimmelpilz entpuppte. Die verschwundenen Crewmitglieder wurden ebenfalls in dem Modul gefunden, völlig verängstigt und ohne jede Erinnerung daran, was geschehen war. Sie kamen noch innerhalb des Moduls wieder zu Sinnen. Eine halbe Stunde länger und sie wären in der Biomasse ertrunken, die noch immer aus dem Spiegel quoll.
languages.original_text: The compartment was brimming with biomatter — strange creatures and plants floating in streams of a slimy substance, revealed to be a type of mould upon closer inspection. The missing crew members were also found inside, terrified and unable to remember anything. They returned to awareness while still inside the compartment. They had been only half an hour away from drowning in the biomatter still oozing from the mirror.

traits.locale_text: Das Modul quoll über von Biomasse — merkwürdige Kreaturen und Pflanzen, die in Strömen einer schleimigen Substanz schwammen, die sich bei näherer Betrachtung als eine Art Schimmelpilz entpuppte. Die verschwundenen Crewmitglieder wurden ebenfalls in dem Modul gefunden, völlig verängstigt und ohne jede Erinnerung daran, was geschehen war. Sie kamen noch innerhalb des Moduls wieder zu Sinnen. Eine halbe Stunde länger und sie wären in der Biomasse ertrunken, die noch immer aus dem Spiegel quoll.

languages.text: Le compartiment était rempli de biomatière : d'étranges créatures et des plantes flottant dans des bandes d'une substance gluante, qui s'est révélée être une sorte de moisissure après une analyse approfondie. Les membres d'équipages disparus ont également été trouvés à l'intérieur, terrifiés et incapables de se souvenir de quoi que ce soit. Ils ont repris conscience alors qu'ils étaient encore dans le compartiment. Une demi-heure plus tard, ils se seraient noyés dans la biomatière qui suintait encore du miroir.
languages.original_text: The compartment was brimming with biomatter — strange creatures and plants floating in streams of a slimy substance, revealed to be a type of mould upon closer inspection. The missing crew members were also found inside, terrified and unable to remember anything. They returned to awareness while still inside the compartment. They had been only half an hour away from drowning in the biomatter still oozing from the mirror.

languages.text: Kompartıman, ağzına kadar biyomaddeyle dolu. Yakından incelendiğinde bir tür küf olduğu anlaşılan, sümüksü bir maddenin içinde garip yaratık ve bitkilerin yüzdüğü görülüyor. Kayıp mürettebat da içeride dehşete düşmüş ve hiçbir şey hatırlamıyor hâlde bulunuyor. Kompartımandayken bilinçleri yerine geliyor. Bu hâlde bulunduklarında, aynadan sızan biyomaddenin içinde boğulmaktan yarım saat kadar uzakta oldukları görülüyor.
languages.original_text: The compartment was brimming with biomatter — strange creatures and plants floating in streams of a slimy substance, revealed to be a type of mould upon closer inspection. The missing crew members were also found inside, terrified and unable to remember anything. They returned to awareness while still inside the compartment. They had been only half an hour away from drowning in the biomatter still oozing from the mirror.
